promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a chibi cute mythical beetle psychic-type with a golden crystal core. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or beetle. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Aurigem, a chibi cute mythical beetle psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: rest. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word beetle or psychic or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, beetle-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: Aurigem hides in crypts and glows in the dark. It restores its energy by taking a daily rest in its secret burrows.
